name: Crab soup
description:
The game was developed for  Weekly Game Jam 162!

Controls:

1.Claw rotates in the direction of the mouse.

2.Click and hold the left mouse button to hold the item.

3.Let go the left mouse button to throw the item.

4.You can also eat a vegetable when you hold it (by holding it up to the crab's mouth).

5.If you fall into the water, you will die.
